ing.item: Box (15-oz) raisin bran; or any bran flakes

directions.step:
Date: Mon, 12 Feb 1996 12:23:41 -0500
From: kmeade@ids2.idsonline.com (The Meades)
Subject: Re: Refrigeratable muffin mixes Recipe By: Debra Fisher <DFISHER@PSUHMC.HMC.PSU.EDU>
Bake at 400 degreees for 15-20 minutes. Makes about 4 dozen. I use regular buttermilk not the mix. You can add extra buttermilk if you have it, I do sometimes.
